itemDisplayName: Red Hat WildFly 18.0.1.Final on CentOS 8 (standalone mode)
description: This template allows you to create a CentOS 8 VM running WildFly 18.0.1.Final and also deploy a web application called Java-EAP on Azure, you can login into the Admin Console using the Wildfly Username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application named Java-EAP on Azure on a standalone node of WildFly 18.0.1.Final running on CentOS 8 VM.
